.. py:module:: momotor.rpc.proto

===================
Protocol definition
===================

The :py:mod:`momotor.rpc.proto` package contains the `gRPC <grpc.io>`_ protocol definitions
and the generated Python code for them.

Documentation for the RPC services and messages can be found in the protocol files.

.. _momotor.rpc.proto.asset:
